name: RoomBattle (DustGames)
description:
Have you ever seen cleaner robots fighting?? RoomBattle took that crazy idea and made it into a multiplayer game!

RoomBattle is a "competitive" party game up to 6 players. You can fight in two game modes that will make sparks fly with your friends. Customize your robot as you want with different sharping weapons and cutie skins. Be prepared to fight in your living room and good look running away from this violent cleaner robots! Our Team

RoomBattle is a university project made by Dust Games, whose members are:
